code: var base_url=process.env.NODE_ENV==='production'?'https://6kvg1ametl.execute-api.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/test':'';export var getTodos=function getTodos(){return fetch(base_url+"/api/todo").then(function(res){return res.json();});};export var createTodo=function createTodo(todo){return fetch(base_url+"/api/todo/create",{method:"POST",headers:{"Access-Control-Allow-Origin":"*","Accept":"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(todo)});};export var updateTodo=function updateTodo(todo,id){return fetch(base_url+"/api/todo/".concat(id),{method:"POST",headers:{"Access-Control-Allow-Origin":"*","Accept":"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(todo)});};export var deleteTodo=function deleteTodo(todo,id){return fetch(base_url+"/api/todo/".concat(id),{method:"POST",headers:{"Access-Control-Allow-Origin":"*","Accept":"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(todo)});};export var getTodo=function getTodo(id){return fetch(base_url+"/api/todo/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return res.json();});};
